Feb 18, 08:23 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our Public Cloud Load Balancer on GRA11 region.

Here are the details of the maintenance:

End time : 18/03/2026 11:00 UTC

This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform.
If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

Thank you for your understanding.
